author: mmarinschek
msg: reverting last change on saving uniqueIdCounter.
It needs to rest assured that the uniqueIdCounter starts anew as this is our only way to associate components and corresponding tags upon a new request.
In JSF1.2, there will be the JspIdConsumer interface which tags can implement to get their id stamped on directly by the container - this will solve such problems...
